snippet: Phil Jackson, the Knicks’ president, said the game against the Lakers on Thursday night in Los Angeles was “a chance to play a game that’s decent."
abstract: Phil Jackson admits he has not done well for New York Knicks in his first year as team president, but retains hope for next; sees opportunity in game against Los Angeles Lakers, who have also had losing season.
lead_paragraph: Phil Jackson, the Knicks’ president, said the game against the Lakers on Thursday night in Los Angeles was “a chance to play a game that’s decent."

headline.main: Jackson Sees Opportunity as Knicks Visit Lakers
headline.print_headline: Jackson Sees Opportunity as Knicks Visit Lakers
